  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.cgjennings.graphics.paints.CheckeredPaint
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Paint, Transparency
    public class CheckeredPaint
extends Object
implements Paint
    Paints shapes with a pattern of checkered boxes in two colours.
